about_the_game: Play as an elephant on a rampage!  The objective is simple, destroy killer robots to score points Features high-paced action as more and more robots spawn with deadly intent. You can now play as both Ele the Elephant who uses a water blast to destroy her enemies and Wooly the Mammoth who prefers to take things up close and personal, each character has their own unique style. Players can also compete to find out who is the best using the online leaderboards.
detailed_description: Play as an elephant on a rampage!  The objective is simple, destroy killer robots to score points Features high-paced action as more and more robots spawn with deadly intent. You can now play as both Ele the Elephant who uses a water blast to destroy her enemies and Wooly the Mammoth who prefers to take things up close and personal, each character has their own unique style. Players can also compete to find out who is the best using the online leaderboards.
name: ELE RAMPAGE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @3.50GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 @3.5GHz/3.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: Destroy robots and send humans flying by ramming into them as a big angry elephant, or a giant mammoth and cause as much chaos as possible. The objective is simple but it won't be easy. Features fast paced action.
